verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Speak unto Aaron , and unto his sons , and unto all the children of Israel , and say unto them; This \add is\add* the thing which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath commanded , saying ,
What man soever \add there be\add* of the house of Israel , that killeth an ox , or lamb , or goat , in the camp , or that killeth \add it\add* out of the camp ,

And bringeth it not unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation , to offer an offering unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* before the tabernacle of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; blood shall be imputed unto that man ; he hath shed blood ; and that man shall be cut off from among his people :

To the end that the children of Israel may bring their sacrifices , which they offer in the open field , even that they may bring them unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation , unto the priest , and offer them \add for\add* peace offerings unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the priest shall sprinkle the blood upon the altar of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add at\add* the door of the tabernacle of the congregation , and burn the fat for a sweet savour unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
And they shall no more offer their sacrifices unto devils , after whom they have gone a whoring. This shall be a statute for ever unto them throughout their generations. \p
¶ And thou shalt say unto them, Whatsoever man \add there be\add* of the house of Israel , or of the strangers which sojourn among you, that offereth a burnt offering or sacrifice ,
And bringeth it not unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation , to offer it unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; even that man shall be cut off from among his people. \p

¶ And whatsoever man \add there be\add* of the house of Israel , or of the strangers that sojourn among you, that eateth any manner of blood ; I will even set my face against that soul that eateth blood , and will cut him off from among his people.

For the life of the flesh \add is\add* in the blood : and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls : for it \add is\add* the blood \add that\add* maketh an atonement for the soul.
Therefore I said unto the children of Israel , No soul of you shall eat blood , neither shall any stranger that sojourneth among you eat blood.

And whatsoever man \add there be\add* of the children of Israel , or of the strangers that sojourn among you, which hunteth and catcheth any beast or fowl that may be eaten ; he shall even pour out the blood thereof, and cover it with dust.\f + \fr 17.13 \ft which…: Heb. that hunteth any hunting\f*

For \add it is\add* the life of all flesh ; the blood of it \add is\add* for the life thereof: therefore I said unto the children of Israel , Ye shall eat the blood of no manner of flesh : for the life of all flesh \add is\add* the blood thereof: whosoever eateth it shall be cut off.

And every soul that eateth that which died \add of itself\add*, or that which was torn \add with beasts, whether it be\add* one of your own country , or a stranger , he shall both wash his clothes , and bathe \add himself\add* in water , and be unclean until the even : then shall he be clean.\f + \fr 17.15 \ft that which died…: Heb. a carcase\f*
But if he wash \add them\add* not, nor bathe his flesh ; then he shall bear his iniquity.
